title: Automakers wait and worry as opposition to Mexican, other tariffs mounts
text: Even if the Mexican tariffs are scrubbed, automakers are struggling to figure out how to operate under a president who has described himself as the "tariff man."

title: My Dividend Growth Portfolio May Update: 42 Holdings, 1 Buy
text: This article series covers my investing journey as a father of two towards my eventual retirement.

title: China’s Huawei to develop 5G with Russia’s MTS
text: BEIJING — Huawei Technologies has signed an agreement with the Russian telecom company MTS to develop next-generation “5G” networks. The deal was signed Wednesday in Moscow, as Chinese President Xi Jinping and his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin looked on.

title: Oil In Bear Market; Is Now The Time To Buy?

title: Vitaliy Katsenelson's Contrarian Edge: These opposite investment strategies are battling to control your stock portfolio
text: Growth-stock investors can gloat over value investors — for now, writes Vitaliy Katsenelson.

title: Trade tensions flare sours rate hope rally
text: German bond yields plumbed new record lows on Thursday and U.S. treasury yields resumed their fall as renewed trade tensions doused a rally fueled by hopes for more central bank stimulus ahead of a European Central Bank meeting.

title: Card Counting Meets The Stock Market: A Statistical Model For Predicting 1-3 Month Returns
text: A simple 3-part model may forecast stock returns.

title: French bank Credit Agricole sets target to raise net profit above 5 billion euros in 2022
text: French bank Credit Agricole unveiled a new set of profitability targets for 2022 after it met its 2019 targets a year ahead of schedule.

title: The European Central Bank meets as inflation cools and trade tensions heat up
text: The European Central Bank (ECB) announced its easy-money exit strategy one year ago. But twelve months on, the world couldn't look more different.

title: China grants first 5G licenses amid Huawei global setback
text: It’s official. After much anticipation, China named the first companies to receive 5G licenses for commercial use on Thursday.

title: Asia shares muted, trade risk offsets rate hopes
text: Asian markets were in a mixed mood on Thursday as fears the  U.S. trade tussle with Mexico would further depress global growth, warred with wagers central banks would have to respond with fresh stimulus.
